summary: The only one valid traitor theory
caption: The only one valid traitor theory

body:
História Última Parada

Bem… Vim divulgar uma fic minha, então vou falar rapidinho sobre o que ela trata e queria pedir que dessem uma chance caso se interessem ^^.

•°•°•°•°•°•°•°•°•°•°•°•°•°•°•°•°•°•°•°•°•

• Os personagens são do anime Boku no hero academia, porém não existem individualidades e o “universo” é diferente (Isso não quer dizer que se passa em outro mundo ou algo assim ^^’)

• Apesar de não focar no romance o casal principal é Kirishima x Midoriya (Kirideku), ou seja, é yaoi.

• Alguns personagens sofreram ou poderão sofrer mudanças na personalidade, como é o caso do Sero Hanta, por exemplo, que eu acabei por deixá-lo um pouco mais sério.

• Como é uma história mais focada no “sobrenatural” (ou pelo menos era para ser…), cada personagem tem um passado um tanto forte (deixarei assim por falta de uma definição melhor), então cenas de violência podem ser comuns.

• A história principal é centrada no Midoriya, que acabou por se hospedar em uma pousada mal assombrada, contudo, como eu disse antes, cada personagem terá uma história solo que será contada em forma de One-Shot ao término do enredo principal.

•°•°•°•°•°•°•°•°•°•°•°•°•°•°•°•°•°•°•°•°•

É isso… Espero que me dêem uma chance, e se derem, espero (sinceramente) que gostem ^^.

blog.name: go-n-ef
blog.title: Lazlo
blog.description: Too many thoughts running through my head had to find a way to set them free

summary: If you’re still taking prompts id love to see some tododeku working together as pro heroes thank u ❤️
question: If you’re still taking prompts id love to see some tododeku working together as pro heroes thank u ❤️
answer:
Shouto loved his boyfriend, he loved him more than anything in the world and would do anything and everything to make sure that he is always safe and that he never loses his smile.

He had no problem with Izuku becoming a Pro-Hero, hell he always had a firm belief that Izuku would be the greatest hero of all time, that he would be the one to surpassed not only All Might but him and Bakugou as well, and he was right.

Over the course of years Izuku has become a symbol of his own; originally he was shooting to become the next symbol of Peace but then realized that he was his own person and in his own words it was his own quirk no one else’s.

So over the years, he became a symbol of Hope, one that showed everyone that anyone can be a hero, even if they were born quirkless-it still shocks him to his core that Izuku was once quirkless and his power literally came from All Might-or if they started off on the wrong path that it is never to late to turn your life around.

Yes, his boyfriend became an amazing hero and a symbol on his own, the only problem Shouto had with Izuku was him being reckless, it would seem that even as a 25 year old man Izuku still had the nasty habit of running head first and putting himself on the front of the line to protect the ones who needed his protection.

Shouto didn’t blame him, he was a hero; it was a hero’s job to save everyone from danger, but it was also a hero’s job to stop and think of the situation before he jumped first and asked questions later.

A perfect example would be fighting a new villain known as Drainer, she had a quirk that could suck the life of anyone she touched, the more lives she drained the stronger she got, and that was her greatest weakness.

The more lives she drained the stronger she became, the problem was that her body could not handle all the power it consumed and the more she had the weaker her muscles were holding it all in before they literally exploded.

She already drained a few heroes that tried to stop her from killing the hostages that she held captive and now he, Izuku, Bakugou, and Kirishima were at the scene of the crime waiting for Sero, Iida, and Uraraka. The three of them had quirks that worked best for a situation like this, especially Sero.

While Shouto could use his ice to trap her he learned that with all the power she had she was able to rip herself away from his ice.

“We have to do something,” Izuku asked, Shouto could see his muscles twitching, he knew that Deku wanted to go and save the victims, but he was fighting his instincts, stopping himself from doing something so wreck less.

“Uravity, Cellophan, and Ingenium would be here any minute now we have to be patient,” Kirishima said looking at the victims, Drainer had a little boy by the shirt taunting the heroes to fight her or she’ll kill him next.

“Were the fuck, are they? We send a distress call three minutes ago and I know damn well that Sero isn’t to far from where we are,” surprisingly the comment didn’t came from Bakugou-who has mellowed out since he started dating Kirishima-it came from Shouto.

“Calm down Half-and-Half, they are on their way, let’s not forget that Drainer has her goons out there fighting them so it might be a while,”

“We don’t have a while, if we don’t do something now they will hurt the kid and his family,”

The four heroes stayed silent as they realized how right the duel quirk user was and knew they had to act now or else they would lose not only the victims but also the villain and that is something they did not want to happen, they already lost her once and it took them forever to find her they weren’t going to lose this opportunity again.

“So, what do we do?” Kirishima asked, Izuku looked at Shouto as well. He had a plan but he doubt that Shouto would even want to do it.

“I, I have an-“

“I have an idea,” Shouto said looking at them in the eyes, letting them know he was being serious and that he was serious about having a plan, one that might work. In the past he always followed orders, always listen to everyone’s command when it came to plans especially after his epic fail with Momo and their practical exams when they were first years in U.A. but now he knew better and knew that his plan could work.

“Okay, what is it?” Izuku asked looking at him, one thing Shouto loved about Izuku is he always gave Shouto his unquestionable trust, knew his boyfriend was smart to come up with a plan that would save all of them.

“Okay here it is,” Shouto began to tell the others his plan, they all listen carefully to the fire and ice user as he explained every little detail of his plan and asked them if they had any questions or concerns of his plan.

Izuku did, while yes Shouto’s plan was full proof and if done correctly guaranteed to work the problem he had with this plan was that Shouto would be the target, the one to lure out Drainer since she made it perfectly clear that she wanted Shouto and only Shouto.

He shouldn’t do something like that, shouldn’t be so wreck less and risk his life like that. Before he could voice his opinion Shouto walked out of their hiding spot with his hands in the air in a surrendering motion.

“Drainer,”

“Shouto!” the villainess shriek in joy, Bakugou and Kirishima looked at one another before heading to their respective area while Izuku stood behind waiting for the signal.

“I surrender, release the victims and I will go with you willingly,”

“Hmm…how do I know you aren’t armed?”

“I’m not,”

“Okay, they can go, but not until you come over here and stay put,”

“Understood,”

Shouto was walking calmly towards the villainess with ease, once he was two feet from her she released the boy and his family who scurried away from the hero and villain.

“Now then,” before she could even get her hands on him Izuku jumped from his spot ready to capture her with his whip.

“What the-?”

“Deku you idiot!” Kirishima and Bakugou shouted.

Drainer saw the whip and easily dodge it before she reached for Shouto, she would’ve gotten a hold on him if it weren’t for Izuku who was quick to throw a punch on her knocking her out cold, he then used his whip to tie her up.

“Alright everyone, let’s take her to Tartous and make sure she’s secure,” he called for the officers who immediately rushed to his side and grabbed Drainer.

Izuku gave them all a friendly smile and was thanking them as they all left.

“Deku, you bastard,” Izuku jumped knowing that Kachan was probably pissed at him, he turned ready to apologize but instead of meeting Kachan’s angry face he met Shouto’s glare.

“Umm…”

“Why didn’t you wait for the signal?”

“Because, well…it’s just…I mean, your plan was smart but-“

“Do you not trust me?”

“Of course, I do,”

“Then why didn’t you follow my plan?”

Izuku stared at his boyfriend before wrapping his arms around him.

“Izu-“

“I’m sorry! It’s just that…I know I am wreck less and I know I worry you but…when it comes to you, I can’t handle you doing something crazy. I worried for you and knowing you were going to do something like that and get hurt I couldn’t bear it and I’m sorry,”

Shouto stayed silent for a moment or two before he wrapped his own arms around him, squeezing him tight he pressed a kiss on the top of his head.

“I get it Izuku, I get that you were scared but I am a hero and risking my life is part of the job, I mean you do it all the time right?” he teased his boyfriend.

Said boyfriend giggle a little.

“I get scared too, when you do something stupid, but I know you’ll be okay because you always come back to me. You have to trust me as well and know that I will come back to you as well okay?”

Izuku smiled before pulling away a little he then stood on his tippy toes and kissed his cheek.

“Okay, next time you plan something wreck less I’ll trust you,”

“No, you won’t,”

“Yeah, your right,”

The two laughed before hugging each other again.

I want to write some prompts so if you guys have any Damijon, timkon, birdflash, jaytim, jayroy, Bakumomo, Tododeku, Soriku, Suzalulu, Bakushima, or dabihawks then send them my way ^^

“So, what do we do?” Kirishima asked, Izuku looked at Shouto as well. He had a plan but he doubt that Shouto would even want to do it.

“I, I have an-“

“I have an idea,” Shouto said looking at them in the eyes, letting them know he was being serious and that he was serious about having a plan, one that might work. In the past he always followed orders, always listen to everyone’s command when it came to plans especially after his epic fail with Momo and their practical exams when they were first years in U.A. but now he knew better and knew that his plan could work.

“Okay, what is it?” Izuku asked looking at him, one thing Shouto loved about Izuku is he always gave Shouto his unquestionable trust, knew his boyfriend was smart to come up with a plan that would save all of them.

“Okay here it is,” Shouto began to tell the others his plan, they all listen carefully to the fire and ice user as he explained every little detail of his plan and asked them if they had any questions or concerns of his plan.

Izuku did, while yes Shouto’s plan was full proof and if done correctly guaranteed to work the problem he had with this plan was that Shouto would be the target, the one to lure out Drainer since she made it perfectly clear that she wanted Shouto and only Shouto.

He shouldn’t do something like that, shouldn’t be so wreck less and risk his life like that. Before he could voice his opinion Shouto walked out of their hiding spot with his hands in the air in a surrendering motion.

“Drainer,”

“Shouto!” the villainess shriek in joy, Bakugou and Kirishima looked at one another before heading to their respective area while Izuku stood behind waiting for the signal.

“I surrender, release the victims and I will go with you willingly,”

“Hmm…how do I know you aren’t armed?”

“I’m not,”

“Okay, they can go, but not until you come over here and stay put,”

“Understood,”

Shouto was walking calmly towards the villainess with ease, once he was two feet from her she released the boy and his family who scurried away from the hero and villain.

“Now then,” before she could even get her hands on him Izuku jumped from his spot ready to capture her with his whip.

“What the-?”

“Deku you idiot!” Kirishima and Bakugou shouted.

Drainer saw the whip and easily dodge it before she reached for Shouto, she would’ve gotten a hold on him if it weren’t for Izuku who was quick to throw a punch on her knocking her out cold, he then used his whip to tie her up.

“Alright everyone, let’s take her to Tartous and make sure she’s secure,” he called for the officers who immediately rushed to his side and grabbed Drainer.

Izuku gave them all a friendly smile and was thanking them as they all left.

“Deku, you bastard,” Izuku jumped knowing that Kachan was probably pissed at him, he turned ready to apologize but instead of meeting Kachan’s angry face he met Shouto’s glare.

“Umm…”

“Why didn’t you wait for the signal?”

“Because, well…it’s just…I mean, your plan was smart but-“

“Do you not trust me?”

“Of course, I do,”

“Then why didn’t you follow my plan?”

Izuku stared at his boyfriend before wrapping his arms around him.

“Izu-“

“I’m sorry! It’s just that…I know I am wreck less and I know I worry you but…when it comes to you, I can’t handle you doing something crazy. I worried for you and knowing you were going to do something like that and get hurt I couldn’t bear it and I’m sorry,”

Shouto stayed silent for a moment or two before he wrapped his own arms around him, squeezing him tight he pressed a kiss on the top of his head.

“I get it Izuku, I get that you were scared but I am a hero and risking my life is part of the job, I mean you do it all the time right?” he teased his boyfriend.

Said boyfriend giggle a little.

“I get scared too, when you do something stupid, but I know you’ll be okay because you always come back to me. You have to trust me as well and know that I will come back to you as well okay?”

Izuku smiled before pulling away a little he then stood on his tippy toes and kissed his cheek.

“Okay, next time you plan something wreck less I’ll trust you,”

“No, you won’t,”

“Yeah, your right,”

The two laughed before hugging each other again.

I want to write some prompts so if you guys have any Damijon, timkon, birdflash, jaytim, jayroy, Bakumomo, Tododeku, Soriku, Suzalulu, Bakushima, or dabihawks then send them my way ^^
trail.content:
Shouto loved his boyfriend, he loved him more than anything in the world and would do anything and everything to make sure that he is always safe and that he never loses his smile.

He had no problem with Izuku becoming a Pro-Hero, hell he always had a firm belief that Izuku would be the greatest hero of all time, that he would be the one to surpassed not only All Might but him and Bakugou as well, and he was right.

Over the course of years Izuku has become a symbol of his own; originally he was shooting to become the next symbol of Peace but then realized that he was his own person and in his own words it was his own quirk no one else’s.

So over the years, he became a symbol of Hope, one that showed everyone that anyone can be a hero, even if they were born quirkless-it still shocks him to his core that Izuku was once quirkless and his power literally came from All Might-or if they started off on the wrong path that it is never to late to turn your life around.

Yes, his boyfriend became an amazing hero and a symbol on his own, the only problem Shouto had with Izuku was him being reckless, it would seem that even as a 25 year old man Izuku still had the nasty habit of running head first and putting himself on the front of the line to protect the ones who needed his protection.

Shouto didn’t blame him, he was a hero; it was a hero’s job to save everyone from danger, but it was also a hero’s job to stop and think of the situation before he jumped first and asked questions later.

A perfect example would be fighting a new villain known as Drainer, she had a quirk that could suck the life of anyone she touched, the more lives she drained the stronger she got, and that was her greatest weakness.

The more lives she drained the stronger she became, the problem was that her body could not handle all the power it consumed and the more she had the weaker her muscles were holding it all in before they literally exploded.

She already drained a few heroes that tried to stop her from killing the hostages that she held captive and now he, Izuku, Bakugou, and Kirishima were at the scene of the crime waiting for Sero, Iida, and Uraraka. The three of them had quirks that worked best for a situation like this, especially Sero.

While Shouto could use his ice to trap her he learned that with all the power she had she was able to rip herself away from his ice.

“We have to do something,” Izuku asked, Shouto could see his muscles twitching, he knew that Deku wanted to go and save the victims, but he was fighting his instincts, stopping himself from doing something so wreck less.

“Uravity, Cellophan, and Ingenium would be here any minute now we have to be patient,” Kirishima said looking at the victims, Drainer had a little boy by the shirt taunting the heroes to fight her or she’ll kill him next.

“Were the fuck, are they? We send a distress call three minutes ago and I know damn well that Sero isn’t to far from where we are,” surprisingly the comment didn’t came from Bakugou-who has mellowed out since he started dating Kirishima-it came from Shouto.

“Calm down Half-and-Half, they are on their way, let’s not forget that Drainer has her goons out there fighting them so it might be a while,”

“We don’t have a while, if we don’t do something now they will hurt the kid and his family,”

The four heroes stayed silent as they realized how right the duel quirk user was and knew they had to act now or else they would lose not only the victims but also the villain and that is something they did not want to happen, they already lost her once and it took them forever to find her they weren’t going to lose this opportunity again.

“So, what do we do?” Kirishima asked, Izuku looked at Shouto as well. He had a plan but he doubt that Shouto would even want to do it.

“I, I have an-“

“I have an idea,” Shouto said looking at them in the eyes, letting them know he was being serious and that he was serious about having a plan, one that might work. In the past he always followed orders, always listen to everyone’s command when it came to plans especially after his epic fail with Momo and their practical exams when they were first years in U.A. but now he knew better and knew that his plan could work.

“Okay, what is it?” Izuku asked looking at him, one thing Shouto loved about Izuku is he always gave Shouto his unquestionable trust, knew his boyfriend was smart to come up with a plan that would save all of them.

“Okay here it is,” Shouto began to tell the others his plan, they all listen carefully to the fire and ice user as he explained every little detail of his plan and asked them if they had any questions or concerns of his plan.

Izuku did, while yes Shouto’s plan was full proof and if done correctly guaranteed to work the problem he had with this plan was that Shouto would be the target, the one to lure out Drainer since she made it perfectly clear that she wanted Shouto and only Shouto.

He shouldn’t do something like that, shouldn’t be so wreck less and risk his life like that. Before he could voice his opinion Shouto walked out of their hiding spot with his hands in the air in a surrendering motion.

“Drainer,”

“Shouto!” the villainess shriek in joy, Bakugou and Kirishima looked at one another before heading to their respective area while Izuku stood behind waiting for the signal.

“I surrender, release the victims and I will go with you willingly,”

“Hmm…how do I know you aren’t armed?”

“I’m not,”

“Okay, they can go, but not until you come over here and stay put,”

“Understood,”

Shouto was walking calmly towards the villainess with ease, once he was two feet from her she released the boy and his family who scurried away from the hero and villain.

“Now then,” before she could even get her hands on him Izuku jumped from his spot ready to capture her with his whip.

“What the-?”

“Deku you idiot!” Kirishima and Bakugou shouted.

Drainer saw the whip and easily dodge it before she reached for Shouto, she would’ve gotten a hold on him if it weren’t for Izuku who was quick to throw a punch on her knocking her out cold, he then used his whip to tie her up.

“Alright everyone, let’s take her to Tartous and make sure she’s secure,” he called for the officers who immediately rushed to his side and grabbed Drainer.

Izuku gave them all a friendly smile and was thanking them as they all left.

“Deku, you bastard,” Izuku jumped knowing that Kachan was probably pissed at him, he turned ready to apologize but instead of meeting Kachan’s angry face he met Shouto’s glare.

“Umm…”

“Why didn’t you wait for the signal?”

“Because, well…it’s just…I mean, your plan was smart but-“

“Do you not trust me?”

“Of course, I do,”

“Then why didn’t you follow my plan?”

Izuku stared at his boyfriend before wrapping his arms around him.

“Izu-“

“I’m sorry! It’s just that…I know I am wreck less and I know I worry you but…when it comes to you, I can’t handle you doing something crazy. I worried for you and knowing you were going to do something like that and get hurt I couldn’t bear it and I’m sorry,”

Shouto stayed silent for a moment or two before he wrapped his own arms around him, squeezing him tight he pressed a kiss on the top of his head.

“I get it Izuku, I get that you were scared but I am a hero and risking my life is part of the job, I mean you do it all the time right?” he teased his boyfriend.

Said boyfriend giggle a little.

“I get scared too, when you do something stupid, but I know you’ll be okay because you always come back to me. You have to trust me as well and know that I will come back to you as well okay?”

Izuku smiled before pulling away a little he then stood on his tippy toes and kissed his cheek.

“Okay, next time you plan something wreck less I’ll trust you,”

“No, you won’t,”

“Yeah, your right,”

The two laughed before hugging each other again.

summary: stupid class 1-A hcs because its time to show them big love when Kirishima finds out that a lot of them havent seen avatar the...
body:
stupid class 1-A hcs because its time to show them big love

  • when Kirishima finds out that a lot of them havent seen avatar the last airbender he makes everyone watch it with him on Saturday mornings 
  • they all eat late breakfast and rant about the episodes 
  • Bakugou’s favourite character is Toph
  • Ochaco’s is also Toph
  • Kaminari kins Sokka 
  • along with calling Todoroki icy-hot his most popular nickname is now prince Zuko or just Zuko
  • “i dont see the resemblance but go off i guess.”
  • “Todoroki-kun you have nearly the same haircut, same scar placement, and you both have fire powers.” 
  • Iida just cant get over how unorganized their traveling is
  • Iida, waving his arms frantically: what do you mean youre not going to take the quicker and safer route???? Aang please think about this!!
  • Midoriya likes analyzing how they all use their bending powers 
  • because he just never stops
  • during an emotional fight scene: hey Todoroki-kun do you think you could do that??
  • Todoroki, quietly: i am prince Zuko, i can do anything he does
  • thats why Aizawa finds them later talking to Kaminari about channeling his lighting through Todoroki’s body
  • Aizawa just needs a nap 
  • “its an animated show of course its just gonna electrocute him Kaminari.”
  • Kaminari doesnt truly believe anything until he sees it
  • thats why Iida finds Kaminari and Shinsou awake at 2am on the school roof trying to toast marshmallows with his lightning 
  • que disappointed hand waving™
  • Iida is just a tired mum
  • he stress cleans the common room religiously
  • Bakugou stress bakes
  • they make a (begrudgingly) good team when Bakugou makes too much food before an exam and Iida just wants to wash dishes
  • that doesnt mean they both wont yell at everyone else for not cleaning up or cooking for themselves 
  • Kami and Mina are both disaster bi’s 
  • Mina, pointing at Momo and then gesturing wildly towards Todoroki: HHHHHHHHHH DHVFBHGJFKNJNDDKPRETTY
  • Kaminari, dreamily: yeah, me too Mina.
  • Mina trips and falls when she sees Jiro just sitting and the sun hit her face just right
  • Kaminari once saw Sero in a leather jacket and yeah theyre best bros but damn if he isnt gay for that jacket
  • Bakugou will never admit it but if he doesnt see Sero and Kaminari get together soon hes gonna make them get together in his way
  • because these goddamn stupid fuckers cant put aside their ”no homo” bullshit for one fucking second and if they dont figure it out soon im gonna blast it into their brains for fucks sake 
  • lmao its not class 1-A its class 1-GAY at this point and they all know it

summary: AU where Mineta just becomes a pomologists whose personality only revolves around tending plants and fruit (particularly grape).
question: AU where Mineta just becomes a pomologists whose personality only revolves around tending plants and fruit (particularly grape).
answer:
that would actually??? be really interesting???

imagine him respecting women and drinking that respect women juice (in the form of fruit juice). imagine him meeting ibara and instead of the usual perverted antics it would be in canon, he’d actually talk to her about plants and gardening and they actually get along.

hey can someone actually draw or write this AU???

blog.title: Is This Your Card?
blog.description:

Hey I'm Savvy and I can satisfy your need from bands to anime all the way to superheroes!

summary: I asked my brother about his thoughts on BNHA characters...
body:
I asked my brother about his thoughts on BNHA characters…

This is only part 1 of this

Next post is about his thoughts on ships and continuing his thoughts..

Note he’s seven..

Uraraka

Brother : ummm lets see… she’s weak.. because Bakugou easily beat her and she cries a lot.

DEKU

Me : what about Deku?

Brother: who?

Me : ……

Brother : Deku! Oh! The green lighting makes him jump higher. I like him a little bit.

TODOROKI

Brother: let’s do Todoroki!

Me : okay..

Brother : finally! I want to do Dabi’s brother-

Me : get off the table!

Brother : I think Todoroki needs more training from Endeavor. Let me think about it. HIS BROTHER IS DABI.

Bakugou

Me : what about Bakugou?

Brother: okay! That he tells everyone that he kill them. He wants to kill Deku. Really awesome and Powerful!

ENDEAVOR

Me: (sighs) okay Endeavor?

Brother : ooh I like the sound of that! Why does he have fire beard, fire eyes and punches women!!

TORU

Brother : who’s that?

Me : the invisible girl..

Brother : oh can we do the tailman?

MINETA

Brother: whose that?

Me : the grape dude

Brother : oh yeah she’s that grape juice girl. She’s kinda funny but her hair bleeds

Me : wait… she? Minetas a boy!

Brother: no way!

Me : (trying to keep my sanity) yes he is.

All Might

Brother : that he says (inhaled while on the table) I AM HERE!

FAT GUM

Brother : (tries not to laugh)

Me : what,

Brother : whoses that… a fatty (laughs)

Tetsutetsu

Brother : what? Why did you repeat it?

Me: (explains)

Brother : what? His first name and last name are the same! That makes no sense!!

I’ll continue this into a series

If you want more let know or any questions you want to ask my brother…
